data.title: William “Bill” Johnson Jr., 73
data.meta_description: William "Bill" B. Johnson Jr., aged 73, passed away on May 23, 2024, in San Antonio, TX. Born in Michigan on May 31, 1950, Bill spent most of his years in Lakeland, Fl. before making San Antonio his home.
data.text:
William “Bill” B. Johnson Jr., aged 73, passed away on May 23, 2024, in San Antonio, TX. Born in Michigan on May 31, 1950, Bill spent most of his years in Lakeland, Fl. before making San Antonio his home.

Bill is survived by his spouse, Peggy Johnson, his four children: Tony Johnson (Linda), Gary Johnson (Denise), Rita Langdale, and William B. Johnson III (Angela), six grandchildren: Samantha McGhin (Chris), Alan Langdale (Melissa), Andrew Johnson, Summer Johnson, Brenden Bowden, and Ericka Johnson, and four great-grandchildren: Luke Baty, Emily Langdale, Alexia McGhin, and Hailey Langdale. Bill was predeceased in death by his mother, Rita J. Johnson.

A Celebration of Life will be held at United Methodist Temple on July 20th at 11 a.m., preceded by a visitation at 10:30 a.m. In honor of Bill’s love for Bald Eagles, the family requests that, in lieu of flowers, donations be made to the American Eagle Foundation at eagles.org/donate.
